segments.text: Do you have any certificates on computer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have ACRE ( National Computer Rank Examination ) certificate , Rank II .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I failed in my computer course once and I made up my mind to learn it well . Then I made painstaking preparation for 3 months and I finally got it .
segments.speaker: S2
